docs.lead_paragraph: Among the mentally ill, roughly one in five people appear to develop diabetes — about double the normal rate.

headline.main: In Diabetes, One More Burden for the Mentally Ill
headline.print_headline: In Diabetes, One More Burden for the Mentally Ill

docs.snippet: Among the mentally ill, roughly one in five people appear to develop diabetes — about double the normal rate.

docs.lead_paragraph: The regulations, stemming from a 1988 law intended to combat counterfeiting by verifying a drug's pedigree, were originally drafted in 1999.

headline.main: F.D.A. Imposes Long-Delayed Rule to Require Tracking of Prescription Drugs
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Imposes Long-Delayed Rule to Require Tracking of Prescription Drugs

docs.snippet: The regulations, stemming from a 1988 law intended to combat counterfeiting by verifying a drug's pedigree, were originally drafted in 1999.

docs.lead_paragraph: Doctors are reporting that ACE inhibitors may cause birth defects if taken during the first trimester of pregnancy, as they do if taken in the second or third.

headline.main: New Peril Is Seen in a Blood Pressure Drug
headline.sub: Study Finds Birth Defect Risk in First Trimester, as in 2nd or 3rd ;
headline.print_headline: New Peril Is Seen in a Blood Pressure Drug

docs.snippet: Doctors are reporting that ACE inhibitors may cause birth defects if taken during the first trimester of pregnancy, as they do if taken in the second or third.
